import React from 'react' import './ApartmentHeader.scss' export function ApartmentHeader({flat}) { const name = flat.host.name const [firstName, lastName] = name.split('') return (

flat.title

flat.location

{flat.tags.map((tag) => { // Cozy - Canal - Paris 10 return {tag} })}

{firstName} {lastName}

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((num)=> ( = num ? 'on' : ''}>â˜… ))}
) }
